strings.name: OpenStreetMap Help
strings.description: Ask a question and get answers on OSM's community-driven question and answer site.
strings.extendedDescription: {url} is for everyone who needs help with OpenStreetMap.  Whether you are a beginner mapper or have a technical question, we're here to help!

strings.name: OpenStreetMap Foundation
strings.description: OSMF is a UK-based not-for-profit that supports the OpenStreetMap Project
strings.extendedDescription: OSMF supports the OpenStreetMap project by fundraising, maintaining the servers which power OSM, organizing the annual State of the Map conference, and coordinating the volunteers who keep OSM running. You can show your support and have a voice in the direction of OpenStreetMap by joining as an OSMF member here: {signupUrl}
